Articles.Content: This is my DreamChaser, not really a replica but definitely inspired by the crewed Dream Chaser. Carries 4 Kerbals to LKO (and probably beyond if you want, ~800 m/s dV remaining after reaching orbit). Has a docking port to mate with a station. Also has launch and flight abort capabilities. Craft file: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bz_Ul7CrWenUb2pUbUt6N3ZlVmM/view?usp=sharing  Action groups: 1 deploys solar panels, 2 decouples launch abort engines, 3 deploys safety chute (in case you run out of horizontal velocity when gliding).

I am going to make a dream chaser too because this is the THIRD TIME I see one so I'll make one myself

But nice plane anyway
This is my third version. Lots of tweaking went into this project.
